transcript: I see sometimes these podcasts from from successful entrepreneurs and they're like man I'm still worried I could lose it all tomorrow I don't have that like I'm genuinely not afraid of losing it all tomorrow cuz I have lost it before and I got it back if you were lucky cuz there are guys who get lucky and if you are lucky then absolutely you should be worried about it because if you do lose it you don't know how to get it back but if you have skills then like I know that I can go to any business and help grow it like and that's valuable that's useful no one cast aside a man who is useful
